dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

description:
ppOpen-APPL/DEM provides fundamental components of the particle
simulations based on the discrete element method (DEM). ppOpen-APPL/DEM
(ver.1.0.0) includes the libraries for the DEM, sample codes, and data
sets. ppOpen-APPL/DEM-Util provides the preconditioning utilities. This
utility prepares data sets of distributed data files from the mesh data
sets.
name: ppopen-appl-dem-util

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
